data.title: Tied The Knot With Her Director Last Year, Pooja Sharma Becomes A Proud Mother
data.meta_description: Diya Aur Baati Hum fame actress, Pooja Sharma tied the knot with the director of the show, Pushkar Pandiit on February 22, 2016. After enjoying the marital
data.text:
It seems that this year is proving to be one of the luckiest years for our television and Bollywood celebs so far. Whether we talk about celebs getting married or embracing parenthood, the list is a long one (like literally a long one!).

advertisement

And now, we have another telly land diva who has given us one more reason to rejoice, and it is none other than, Diya Aur Baati Hum fame actress, Pooja Sharma.

Recommended Read: Mommy Nisha Shares The Adorable Pictures Of Baby Kavish From His Naamkaran Pooja

advertisement

advertisement

It was just some time back only that the lead actress of the show Diya Aut Baati Hum, Deepika Singh became proud mother to a baby boy, and now, Pooja gave us the good news.

advertisement

Pooja, who also bagged fame through another serial of hers, Main Tera Hero, tied the knot with the director of the show, Pushkar Pandiit on February 22, 2016. After enjoying the marital bliss for a year, the couple became proud parents to a baby girl on August 16, 2017.

advertisement

You May Also Like: Kinshuk Mahajan Is Blessed With Twins And The Proud Dad Shares Their First Picture

advertisement.

Just like any other couple, these two are also overjoyed with the arrival of the little one. When famous entertainment tabloid contacted Pooja, here’s what the elated newbie mommy said:

“The baby and I are doing fine. We always wanted to have a baby girl so it’s like a cherry on cake for us. Pushkar is overjoyed at this moment.”

And now, Pooja has shared the first looks of her baby girl on her Instagram handle, and we must say the little cutesy is looking super-adorable.

advertisement

advertisement

And not only this, Pooja also captioned the post with this beautiful message:

“My whole life I knew that I wanted children and that moment is finally here. My mind is blown away by this bundle of joy and I can't thank god enough for this perfect blessing! Dearest Viyana, Welcome to this wonderful world my darling girl. You are so very loved”

You May Like: This Bollywood Actress Is Pregnant Again And Is Babymooning In The Gorgeous Croatia

ADVT.

advertisement

The papa too was excited and said:

“It’s such an amazing feeling. It feels like life has completely changed. I am getting a lot of calls from everyone and we are extremely happy.”

advertisement

She further added:

"Everyone used to tell us that it would be a boy for us but we always wanted to have a baby girl. We became so happy to hear the news about the arrival of our baby girl. She is fair and beautiful. A star is born! She looks like Pooja now and her eyes are like me. Pooja and I are fighting over it (chuckles).”

Recommended Read: After Broken Engagement, 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' Fame Secretly Marries 'Badlapur Boys' Actor

Team BollywoodShaadis congratulates Pooja Sharma and Pushkar Pandiit on entering the parents’ union. We are waiting for the pics and name of the baby, share them soon. And all you guys, stay tuned with us right here to get the latest updates related to your favourite celebs!

advertisement
